plot: Oddie, the main character was interrupted by the bully, Pitt while he's having fun in front of a milk vending machine. Oddie later figured out a way to revenge and make fun of Pitt back.
title: The Wanna-Be Oddie
plot_es: Oddie, the main character was interrupted by the bully, Pitt while he's having fun in front of a milk vending machine. Oddie later figured out a way to revenge and make fun of Pitt back.
plot_en: Oddie, the main character was interrupted by the bully, Pitt while he's having fun in front of a milk vending machine. Oddie later figured out a way to revenge and make fun of Pitt back.
